#summary Console command: properties
#labels console

= Properties =

Return all the properties setted.

== Syntax ==

{{{properties}}}

== Example ==

{{{
> properties

PROPERTIES:
+---------------------+----------------------+
| NAME                | VALUE                |
+---------------------+----------------------+
| limit               = 20                   |
+---------------------+----------------------+
}}}

== See also ==

To change a property value use the [ConsoleCommandSet set].

This is a command of the Orient console. To know all the commands go to [ConsoleCommands Console commands].
